Package interfaces

Interface IOfficerService

public interface IOfficerService
Interface for services related to Officer operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Officer
    createOfficer(String nric, String name, String password, int age, String maritalStatus)
    Creates a new Officer with the given details.
    Map<String,Officer>
    getAllOfficers()
    Retrieves a map of all registered officers.
    Officer
    getOfficer(String nric)
    Retrieves an officer by their NRIC.
    String
    registerProject(Officer officer, BTOProject project)
    Registers an officer for a BTO project, subject to validation rules.

  • Method Details

    • createOfficer

      Officer createOfficer(String nric, String name, String password, int age, String maritalStatus)
      Creates a new Officer with the given details.
      Parameters:
      nric - NRIC of the officer
      name - Name of the officer
      password - Officer's password
      age - Age of the officer
      maritalStatus - Marital status of the officer
      Returns:
      The newly created Officer object

    • getOfficer

      Officer getOfficer(String nric)
      Retrieves an officer by their NRIC.
      Parameters:
      nric - The NRIC of the officer
      Returns:
      The Officer object if found, otherwise null

    • getAllOfficers

      Map<String,Officer> getAllOfficers()
      Retrieves a map of all registered officers.
      Returns:
      A map with NRICs as keys and Officer objects as values

    • registerProject

      String registerProject(Officer officer, BTOProject project)
      Registers an officer for a BTO project, subject to validation rules.
      Parameters:
      officer - The officer attempting to register
      project - The BTO project to register for
      Returns:
      A message indicating the result of the registration attempt
